mapper.select: select ov.id, ov.name, ov.deposit_url as depositUrl, ov.upload_mode as uploadModeCode, ov.upload_url as uploadUrl, ov.format, ov.remark, ov.org_id as orgId, ov.create_user_id as createUserId, ov.create_time as createTime, o.org_cname as orgName, u.name as createUserName from cw_base_offline_video ov left join cw_ge_organization o on ov.org_id = o.org_id left join cw_ge_user u on ov.create_user_id = u.user_id where ov.status = 1
